name: [FNF] Vs Grunt
description:
Have you ever wanted to 1v1 a madness grunt in a rap battle? Now ya can.

*Made In Kade Engine

Lore:

While Girlfriend is on Vacation in the Bahamas (which her parents sent her on) Boyfriend who is alone decides to go back to Nevada to see if Tricky is still mad over losing to him 3 months ago in a rap battle, but instead he encounters a Grunt who challenged him to rap battle.

Currently only replaces Week 3 with no new songs however all assets have been changed to fit the theme of Grunt/Madness Combat

Currently we have plans to make this a full week but nothing is confirmed as of now, however a Multiplayer port of Grunt (Just Grunt If it’s made Before The Full week Though) will most likely be made soon.

If and when we edit the code i’ll [Try to] Upload the code to GitHub.
